content: **crochet top and bottom edge on skirt in drops den-m-nit or cotton light** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no r-379 ---------------------------------------------------------- size s - m - l materials drops den-m-nit from garnstudio 150-150-200 g colour no 51 blue or use drops cotton light from garnstudio 150-150-200 g colour no 33 blue bonnet drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm us d
